    • rqog-package for R

rqog-package. Download data from the Quality of Government Institute data

Download latest datasets from the Quality of Government Institute using the function read_qog(). See ?read_qog for instructions.

Installation

dectools::install_github("ropengov/rqog")
library(rqog)

Use

Download data

library(rqog)
dat <- read_qog(which.data = "standard", data.dir = "datafolder")

Browse metadata

library(rqog)
meta_std_ts[grepl("Corruption", meta_std_ts$name, ignore.case = TRUE),]

See the vignette for examples http://ropengov.github.io/rqog/articles/rqog_tutorial.html and data.markuskainu.fi/qog/ for an interactive access to metadata.
